subject: Re: Wolf IQ | Help on MasterClass
preview: Hi Lauren,  Happy New Year! I hope you had a wonderful break.  Just circling back to let you know the team has finished those website updates for you. Everything is now live and ready for your review.

full_threads.body:
Hi Lauren,

Happy New Year! I hope you had a wonderful break.

Just circling back to let you know the team has finished those website updates for you. Everything is now live and ready for your review.

What we’ve completed:
  • Homepage: Updated the layout with the larger H1, adjusted the CTA, and moved the text as requested.
  • About Page: Improved the layout for clarity.
  • FAQs: Tweaked the headers for better SEO.
  • Mobile Navigation: Fixed the logo visibility so it appears correctly on mobile.

One quick note on the Logo: Our dev team noticed that we don't have the exact font file for the original logo text. They have used the closest possible match for the mobile navigation fix, but to get it pixel-perfect, do you happen to have the original source file (e.g., an AI, EPS, or PDF file) handy?

If not, no worries - it is already very close - but if you have the file, send it over and we can swap it in to be 100% precise.

Let us know what you think when you have a moment to take a look!

action.text: Marcelo Meneses assigned to Adriane Roa

full_threads.body:
• https://autismmasterclass.com/about-us/
  • https://autismmasterclass.com/
  • https://autismmasterclass.com/faqs/

One quick note regarding the branding: i haven't been able to locate an exact match for the original font used in the logo. i've used the closest alternative available, but to get it pixel-perfect, we'll need the source file.

(Time: 120mins)
-Glen

@marcelo

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Marcelo Meneses

full_threads.body:
Hi Lauren,

Awesome, thanks for the go-ahead.

Looping in @Wolf IQ Support Team here to get these actioned for you.

They will report back to you with the updates next week.

Thanks,
Andy

Yes, definitely.

As part of our care plan, the following services are included each month:

  • Ongoing support for minor changes (e.g., uploading modules, tweaking content)
For any website update requests, please send them to support@wolfiq.com.au.

Andy will be sending a short one page plan summarizing your setup and recommended improvements of the website.

Feel free to let me know if you have any questions.

Thanks!

From: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>
Date: Tuesday, 10 June 2025 at 1:32 pm
To: Lauren Vankka <hello@autismmasterclass.com>, Cindy Valderama <cindy@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: Re: Wolf IQ | Help on MasterClass

Hi Lauren,


Thanks again for the chat earlier - really great to hear you're carrying forward the Autism MasterClass!


Below is a quick recap and next steps. We should have the site fixed and live by the end of the day.


@Cindy will send an update once confirmed.


Thank you,

Andy


***


Key Points

  • You've recently taken over the MasterClass from the previous charity and want to keep it running and grow it.
  • The course is live and generating sales, but the website has some visible issues (e.g., broken images, missing modules).
  • Your broader goal is to streamline the backend, ensure the site performs well, and eventually expand its reach.
  • You've shared a recent backup and confirmed no major changes since then.
  • You have access to DNS and hosting credentials.

Here are the next steps:

  1. We're restoring the last working version of the site from your backup and applying essential fixes (image loading, page errors, etc.).
  2. We'll provision hosting and support under our Light Care Plan ($139/month), which includes:
  • Hosting, maintenance, and updates
  • Ongoing support for minor changes (e.g., upload modules, tweak content)
  • Fast-response ticketing via support@wolfiq.com.au
  • You can sign up to the care plan here (annual gets you a free month, but monthly an option too)
  1. Once the site is stable, we'll send a short one page plan summarizing your setup and recommended improvements to drive growth and visibility.

From: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Monday, 9 June 2025 5:42 PM
To: Lauren Vankka <hello@autismmasterclass.com>
Subject: Wolf IQ | Help on MasterClass


Hi Lauren


Thanks again for reaching out.


We've had a chance to browse the site and noticed a couple of key issues:

  1. Courses/MasterClass Missing - Upon inspection, it appears that there are currently no courses or MasterClass content visible on the site. This could indicate that content has been removed, hidden due to a plugin conflict, or there may be an issue with how the data is being retrieved.
  2. Login Problems - We've also observed that there are a large number of active plugins, which raises the possibility of a PHP conflict or error preventing users from logging in successfully. This might be causing session or authentication issues.

Two questions for next steps:

  1. Do you have a back-up of the site available?
  2. Do you have an existing hosting and support provider?

We work with 250+ businesses across Australia including 100+ medical providers like MS Australian and would love to support the Autism and Neurodiversity MasterClass long term.


Thanks,

Andy


--
